name: 劉玉蓀
objective: We will introduce topics in digital communication techniques, including Bandpass signals and systems, sampling theory, power spectral density, and digital modulation techniques (pulse amplitude modulation, (PAM), phase shift keying (PSK), frequency shift keying (FSK), quadrture-amplitude modulation (QAM), minimum shift keying (MSK), orthogonal frequency division multiplexing (OFDM)).
schedule:
Bandpass signals and systems, sampling theory, power spectral density (5 weeks)
Random processes, power spectral density (3 weeks)
Baseband pulse transmission  (2 weeks)
Passband digital transmission (PSK, QAM, FSK, MSK,OFDM) (2 months)
materials:
References:
1.　　Simon Haykin, Communication Systems, 3rd ed.
2.　　J. G. Proakis and M. Salehi, Communication Systems Engineering, 2nd ed,
3.　　R. E. Ziemer and R.L. Peterson, Introduction to Digital Communication, 2nd ed.
4.　　J. G. Proakis, Digital Communications, 4th ed.
